Package main

Class CPL_Audit

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.CPL_Audit
  • public class CPL_Audit
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that handles writing information regarding CPL_Election to an audit file. It creates an audit file and uses a FileWriter to add information to the file. Each method writes some sequence of attributes to a file under the assumption the file has been opened. CPL_Audit finishes when the close() method is invoked which closes the FileWriter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CPL_Audit

        public CPL_Audit​(java.lang.String date)
        Instantiates a CPL_Audit object. It is passed a String representing the date and creates a new file in the format CPL_date.txt. A FileWriter is also instantiated and is passed the new file as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        date - String reprsentation of the date

    • Method Detail

      • writeHeaderToFile

        public void writeHeaderToFile​(java.lang.String electionType,
                              Party[] parties,
                              int numBallots,
                              int numSeats)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Writes header information for CPL_Election to the audit file. Writes each party and candidates associated with each party. Writes the total seats to be allocated, the number of ballots cast, and the quota.
        Parameters:
        electionType - String representation of the election type
        parties - Array of Party objects that are in a CPL_Election
        numBallots - number of ballots cast in a CPL_Election
        numSeats - number of seats up for election
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeInitialPartyVotes

        public void writeInitialPartyVotes​(Party[] parties,
                                   int numBallots)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Writes initial tally of vote per party information for the CPL_Election to the audit file. Writes information for each party regarding how many votes recieved including what ballots they recieved, and percentage of votes recieved.
        Parameters:
        parties - Array of Party objects that are in a CPL_Election
        numBallots - number of ballots cast in a CPL_Election
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeFirstSeatsAllocation

        public void writeFirstSeatsAllocation​(Party[] parties)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Writes first round of seat delegation information for the CPL_Election to the audit file. Writes information for each party regarding each party on how many seats they recieved.
        Parameters:
        parties - Array of Party objects that are in a CPL_Election
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeRemainingVotes

        public void writeRemainingVotes​(Party[] parties,
                                int availableSeats)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Writes information regarding remaining ballots outstanding for each party for the CPL_Election to the audit file. Writes information regarding how many seats are left to be allocated and whether a second round is needed.
        Parameters:
        parties - Array of Party objects that are in a CPL_Election
        availableSeats - Seats that are left to be allocated
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeGreatestRemainderParty

        public void writeGreatestRemainderParty​(java.util.ArrayList<Party> tiedParties,
                                        int remainder,
                                        int availableSeats)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes information regarding a list of parties that have the largest remainder of ballots in remainder allocation for the CPL_Election to the audit file. It writes the current number of seats left to be allocated, the number of ballots outstanding, and the parties for which have that number of ballots outstanding.
        Parameters:
        tiedParties - List of parties that have the highest number of remaining ballots.
        remainder - Number of remaining ballots.
        availableSeats - Seats that are left to be allocated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeRemainingSeatsAllocated

        public void writeRemainingSeatsAllocated​(Party p,
                                         int status)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Writes information regarding the success of attempting to allocate an additional seat to a party for the CPL_Election to the audit file. If status is 0, a seat is to be successfully allocated. If status is 1, a seat is to be successfully allocated via a coin toss. If status is 2, a seat is not successfully allocated as party does not have enough candidates. The number of total seats the party is won in current iteration is also written to the audit file
        Parameters:
        p - Party object to potentially allocate a seat to.
        status - status of attempting to allocate additional seat to party.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • extraSeats

        public void extraSeats​(int availableSeats)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes that all remaining votes have been considered in a CPL_Election to the audit file. Writes the number of seats left to be allocated.
        Parameters:
        availableSeats - Seats that are left to be allocated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeTotalSeatDistribution

        public void writeTotalSeatDistribution​(Party[] parties)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes total seat distribution of a CPL_Eleciton to the audit file. Writes number of seats won for each party.
        Parameters:
        parties - Array of Party objects that are in a CPL_Election.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeElectionWinners

        public void writeElectionWinners​(Party[] parties)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes election winners of a CPL_Election to the audit file. Writes each party and which candidate won the seat.
        Parameters:
        parties - Array of Party objects that are in a CPL_Election.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the FileWriter object to the audit file. Assumed file has been opened and FileWriter object initialized.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
